verbose_text: Superoxide dismutase is upregulated following protoporphyrin mediated PDI in S. aureus and RB mediated PDI in S. mutans induces the bacterial heat shock protein GroEL - responsible for refolding denatured proteins to native conformations and stabilizing lipid membranes during stress.
evidence: PDI in S. aureus and RB-mediated PDI in S. mutans induces the bacterial heat
